statements: SELECT * FROM energy_data
SELECT id, production, consumption FROM energy_data
SELECT * FROM energy_data WHERE storage_unit_id = 3
SELECT * FROM energy_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT id, SUM(production) AS total_production FROM energy_data GROUP BY id
SELECT * FROM energy_data ORDER BY production DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT storage_unit_id, SUM(production) AS total_production FROM energy_data GROUP BY storage_unit_id HAVING total_production > 1000
SELECT timestamp, production FROM energy_data WHERE storage_unit_id = 1 AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT AVG(consumption) AS average_consumption, MAX(production) AS max_production FROM energy_data
SELECT storage_unit_id, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM energy_data GROUP BY storage_unit_id ORDER BY total_records DESC
SELECT * FROM storage_units;
SELECT storage_id, production_data FROM storage_units ORDER BY storage_id DESC;
SELECT production_data FROM storage_units WHERE storage_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM energy_tracking ORDER BY time_stamp ASC;
SELECT storage_id, production, consumption FROM energy_tracking WHERE tracking_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM storage_units WHERE production_data > 100 AND consumption_data < 50 ORDER BY storage_id DESC;
SELECT storage_id, (production_data + consumption_data) AS total_data FROM storage_units WHERE storage_id = 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_rows FROM energy_tracking WHERE production > 500 OR consumption > 300;
SELECT storage_id, time_stamp, production, consumption FROM energy_tracking WHERE time_stamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT MAX(production) AS max_production, MIN(consumption) AS min_consumption FROM energy_tracking WHERE storage_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM storage_units
SELECT id, name, location FROM storage_units WHERE id = 1
SELECT location, name FROM storage_units ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT SUM(production_amount) AS total_production FROM energy_production WHERE production_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE consumption_amount > 100 ORDER BY consumption_date ASC
SELECT * FROM storage_units WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, location FROM storage_units WHERE location LIKE '%Main%';
SELECT SUM(production_amount) AS total_production FROM energy_production GROUP BY storage_unit_id;
SELECT storage_units.name, energy_production.production_amount FROM storage_units JOIN energy_production ON storage_units.id = energy_production.storage_unit_id;

SELECT storage_units.name, SUM(energy_consumption.consumption_amount) AS total_consumption FROM storage_units JOIN energy_consumption ON storage_units.id = energy_consumption.storage_unit_id GROUP BY storage_units.name;
SELECT * FROM energy_storage_unit;
SELECT name, production_data FROM energy_storage_unit WHERE production_data > 100;
SELECT id, name, consumption_data FROM energy_storage_unit WHERE consumption_data <= 50;
SELECT * FROM solar_panel ORDER BY efficiency DESC;
SELECT id, serial_number FROM wind_turbine WHERE rotor_diameter > 50;
SELECT * FROM energy_storage_unit WHERE production_data > 1000
SELECT id, name, production_data FROM energy_storage_unit ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT unit_id, serial_number, rotor_diameter FROM wind_turbine WHERE rotor_diameter < 50 ORDER BY unit_id ASC
SELECT name, production_data, consumption_data FROM energy_storage_unit WHERE consumption_data > 500 AND production_data < 2000
SELECT solar_panel.serial_number, battery.capacity FROM solar_panel JOIN battery ON solar_panel.unit_id = battery.unit_id
SELECT * FROM storage_units;
SELECT unit_name, capacity FROM storage_units ORDER BY unit_name DESC;
SELECT production_date, production_amount FROM energy_production WHERE production_date >= '2022-01-01' AND unit_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM unit_location WHERE location_name LIKE '%South%';
SELECT log_date, log_description FROM maintenance_logs ORDER BY log_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM storage_units WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT unit_name, capacity FROM storage_units WHERE unit_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT unit_id, SUM(production_amount) AS total_production FROM energy_production GROUP BY unit_id;
SELECT unit_name, location_name, log_description FROM storage_units su JOIN unit_location ul ON su.id = ul.unit_id JOIN maintenance_logs ml ON su.id = ml.unit_id;
SELECT unit_name, consumption_date, consumption_amount FROM storage_units su JOIN energy_consumption ec ON su.id = ec.unit_id WHERE consumption_amount > 500 ORDER BY consumption_date DESC;
